mapper.select: SELECT r.rownum as rownum, r.no as no, r.user_no as userno, r.name as name, r.title as title, r.date as date , r.hit as hit, r.g_no as gno, r.o_no as ono, r.depth as depth FROM (SELECT @RNUM:=@RNUM+1 'ROWNUM' , a.* FROM (SELECT @RNUM:=0) R, (select b.no, b.user_no, u.name, b.title, b.date, b.hit, b.g_no, b.o_no, b.depth from board b, user u where b.user_no=u.no order by b.g_no desc, b.o_no asc) a) r WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #{begin } AND #{end }
mapper.insert:
insert into board values ( null, #{userno }, #{title }, #{content }, now(), 0, (select * from (select ifnull(max(g_no),0)+1 from board) a), 1, 0)
select last_insert_id()
mapper.update: update board set hit=hit+1 where no=#{no }
update board set title=#{title }, content=#{content }, date=now() where no=#{no }
mapper.insert:

select last_insert_id()
